body_html:
If I remember properly, @szagoruyko avocates the use of tnt.BatchDataset instead of relying on DataLoader to perform the batching, letting the batcher from DataLoader to just be the identity.
Would it be a cleaner solution? To abstract the batching from the DatasetIterator ?
body_text:
If I remember properly, @szagoruyko avocates the use of tnt.BatchDataset instead of relying on DataLoader to perform the batching, letting the batcher from DataLoader to just be the identity.
Would it be a cleaner solution? To abstract the batching from the DatasetIterator ?
body:
If I remember properly, @szagoruyko avocates the use of `tnt.BatchDataset` instead of relying on DataLoader to perform the batching, letting the batcher from DataLoader to just be the identity.
Would it be a cleaner solution? To abstract the batching from the DatasetIterator ?
